languages.text: На глубине под завалами обнаруживаются останки складов, хранилищ, целого лабиринта подозрительных туннелей, перегороженных пневмовратами. Судя по сплющенным контейнерам с полусмазанными метками, грандиозный подземный град принадлежал синдикату контрабандистов.

Deep beneath the rubble, the scouts uncover the remains of warehouses, depots, and a veritable maze of suspicious tunnels gated with airlocks. Judging by the flattened containers with half-effaced markings, the impressively vast subterranean city belonged to a smuggling syndicate.
languages.original_text: На глубине под завалами обнаруживаются останки складов, хранилищ, целого лабиринта подозрительных туннелей, перегороженных пневмовратами. Судя по сплющенным контейнерам с полусмазанными метками, грандиозный подземный град принадлежал синдикату контрабандистов.

traits.locale_text: Deep underneath the rubble, you uncover the remains of warehouses, silos, and a veritable maze of suspicious tunnels gated with airlocks. Judging by the flattened containers with half-effaced markings, the impressively vast subterranean city belonged to a smuggling syndicate.

Deep underneath the rubble, you uncover the remains of warehouses, silos, and a veritable maze of suspicious tunnels gated with airlocks. Judging by the flattened containers with half-effaced markings, the impressively vast subterranean city belonged to a smuggling syndicate.

Deep beneath the rubble, you uncover the remains of warehouses, silos, and a veritable maze of suspicious tunnels gated with airlocks. Judging by the flattened containers with half-effaced markings, the impressively vast subterranean city belonged to a smuggling syndicate.

Deep beneath the rubble, you uncover the remains of warehouses, silos, and a veritable maze of suspicious tunnels gated with airlocks. Judging by the flattened containers with half-effaced markings, the impressively vast subterranean city belonged to a smuggling syndicate.

Deep beneath the rubble, the scouts uncover the remains of warehouses, depots, and a veritable maze of suspicious tunnels gated with airlocks. Judging by the flattened containers with half-effaced markings, the impressively vast subterranean city belonged to a smuggling syndicate.

Deep beneath the rubble, the scouts uncover the remains of warehouses, depots, and a veritable maze of suspicious tunnels gated with airlocks. Judging by the flattened containers with half-effaced markings, the impressively vast subterranean city belonged to a smuggling syndicate.

languages.text: Tief unter dem Geröll entdeckt der Erkundungstrupp neben den Überresten von Lagerhäusern und Depots ein Labyrinth verdächtiger Tunnel, die mit Luftschleusen verschlossen sind. Den zerstörten Containern mit verblassten Markierungen zufolge gehörte die beeindruckende unterirdische Stadt einst einem Schmugglersyndikat.
languages.original_text: Deep beneath the rubble, the scouts uncover the remains of warehouses, depots, and a veritable maze of suspicious tunnels gated with airlocks. Judging by the flattened containers with half-effaced markings, the impressively vast subterranean city belonged to a smuggling syndicate.

traits.locale_text: Tief unter dem Geröll entdeckt der Erkundungstrupp neben den Überresten von Lagerhäusern und Depots ein Labyrinth verdächtiger Tunnel, die mit Luftschleusen verschlossen sind. Den zerstörten Containern mit verblassten Markierungen zufolge gehörte die beeindruckende unterirdische Stadt einst einem Schmugglersyndikat.

languages.text: Dans les profondeurs du gouffre, les éclaireurs découvrent les vestiges d'entrepôts et de dépôts, ainsi qu'un véritable dédale de tunnels suspects fermés par des sas. À en juger par les vestiges de conteneurs aux inscriptions à moitié effacées, cette cité souterraine incroyablement vaste appartenait à un syndicat de contrebande.
languages.original_text: Deep beneath the rubble, the scouts uncover the remains of warehouses, depots, and a veritable maze of suspicious tunnels gated with airlocks. Judging by the flattened containers with half-effaced markings, the impressively vast subterranean city belonged to a smuggling syndicate.

traits.locale_text: Dans les profondeurs du gouffre, les éclaireurs découvrent les vestiges d'entrepôts et de dépôts, ainsi qu'un véritable dédale de tunnels suspects fermés par des sas. À en juger par les vestiges de conteneurs aux inscriptions à moitié effacées, cette cité souterraine incroyablement vaste appartenait à un syndicat de contrebande.

languages.text: 瓦礫の深く下で、偵察部隊は倉庫や貯蔵施設の残骸、そしてエアロックで封鎖された怪しげなトンネルの迷路のような構造を発見した。潰れたコンテナと半ば消えかけた刻印から判断するに、このすばらしく広大な地下都市は密輸組織のものだったようだ。
languages.original_text: Deep beneath the rubble, the scouts uncover the remains of warehouses, depots, and a veritable maze of suspicious tunnels gated with airlocks. Judging by the flattened containers with half-effaced markings, the impressively vast subterranean city belonged to a smuggling syndicate.

traits.locale_text: 瓦礫の深く下で、偵察部隊は倉庫や貯蔵施設の残骸、そしてエアロックで封鎖された怪しげなトンネルの迷路のような構造を発見した。潰れたコンテナと半ば消えかけた刻印から判断するに、このすばらしく広大な地下都市は密輸組織のものだったようだ。

languages.text: Entre los escombros, los exploradores encuentran restos de almacenes, depósitos y un laberinto de túneles sospechosos separados por esclusas. A juzgar por los contenedores aplastados con marcas medio borradas, la ciudad subterránea pertenecía a una organización de contrabandistas.
languages.original_text: Deep beneath the rubble, the scouts uncover the remains of warehouses, depots, and a veritable maze of suspicious tunnels gated with airlocks. Judging by the flattened containers with half-effaced markings, the impressively vast subterranean city belonged to a smuggling syndicate.

traits.locale_text: Entre los escombros, los exploradores encuentran restos de almacenes, depósitos y un laberinto de túneles sospechosos separados por esclusas. A juzgar por los contenedores aplastados con marcas medio borradas, la ciudad subterránea pertenecía a una organización de contrabandistas.

languages.text: 侦察兵在废墟深处发现了部分仓库的残骸，以及一片宛如迷宫的区域，由无数带有气闸的可疑隧道构成。从被压扁的集装箱与残存的标记判断，这座宏伟的地下城市曾是某个走私集团的窝点。
languages.original_text: Deep beneath the rubble, the scouts uncover the remains of warehouses, depots, and a veritable maze of suspicious tunnels gated with airlocks. Judging by the flattened containers with half-effaced markings, the impressively vast subterranean city belonged to a smuggling syndicate.

traits.locale_text: 侦察兵在废墟深处发现了部分仓库的残骸，以及一片宛如迷宫的区域，由无数带有气闸的可疑隧道构成。从被压扁的集装箱与残存的标记判断，这座宏伟的地下城市曾是某个走私集团的窝点。

languages.text: Keşif ekibi, molozların derinliklerinde ambarlar, depolar ve hava kilitli şüpheli tünellerin yer aldığı bir labirentin kalıntılarını keşfediyor. Konteynerlerin üzerlerindeki zar zor seçilebilen işaretlere bakılırsa bu etkileyici derecede geniş yer altı şehri, zamanında bir kaçakçılık örgütüne aitmiş.
languages.original_text: Deep beneath the rubble, the scouts uncover the remains of warehouses, depots, and a veritable maze of suspicious tunnels gated with airlocks. Judging by the flattened containers with half-effaced markings, the impressively vast subterranean city belonged to a smuggling syndicate.

traits.locale_text: Keşif ekibi, molozların derinliklerinde ambarlar, depolar ve hava kilitli şüpheli tünellerin yer aldığı bir labirentin kalıntılarını keşfediyor. Konteynerlerin üzerlerindeki zar zor seçilebilen işaretlere bakılırsa bu etkileyici derecede geniş yer altı şehri, zamanında bir kaçakçı sendikasına aitmiş.
